thread.title: Ad-film director held for molesting minor artiste
thread.title_full: Ad-film director held for molesting minor artiste - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ad-film director held for molesting minor artiste
text:
A 47-year-old ad-film director has been arrested for allegedly molesting a minor artiste during a shoot at South Delhi's Fatehpur Beri, the police said.
Accused Ravinder Ahlawat also owns an acting school in Lajpat Nagar.
The incident was reported last month, after which Ravinder went missing. He was arrested on Wednesday after he returned to Delhi.
In her complaint, the girl stated that Ravinder molested her on the pretext of giving her acting lessons and also offered her roles in documentaries and ad films.
Last month, they went to Fatehpur Beri for a shoot, where he allegedly touched her inappropriately, she stated in her complaint. When she resisted, he threatened to dismiss her from his group. She had joined the group as a child actor a few years ago, he said.
